snippet: David Wright, the Mets’ captain and star player, will be out of action for at least 15 days, and possibly longer, with a strained right hamstring.
abstract: New York Mets place third baseman David Wright on 15-day disabled list with strained hamstring.
lead_paragraph: David Wright, the Mets’ captain and star player, will be out of action for at least 15 days, and possibly longer, with a strained right hamstring.

headline.main: Mets Place Wright on Disabled List
headline.print_headline: Strained Hamstring Could Keep Wright Out 2 to 4 Weeks
